definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The beetle contains a caustic acid-like juice called cantharidin.
sentences.chinese: 该甲虫体内含有一种腐蚀性的酸性液体，名为斑蝥素。

sentences.english: Industrial calcium chloride aqueous solution used as anti-icing fluid has some corrosive action to common metals.
sentences.chinese: 工业氯化钙水溶液作为防冻液有一定的腐蚀性。

sentences.english: The harmfulness of educational corruption has historical corrosion, towards which we can not re-main indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 教育腐败的危害性具有历史腐蚀性，决不可漠然处之。

sentences.english: Owns the top causticity-resistance of pure PTFE.
sentences.chinese: 具有纯PTFE优异的耐腐蚀性。

sentences.english: Residual or process hydrogen chloride within the system should be disposed of using a caustic scrubber.
sentences.chinese: 在系统内的残留氯化氢应该用腐蚀性擦洗器处理。

sentences.english: The Silver Strip Test is an important item to evaluate the corrosiveness of jet fuel.
sentences.chinese: 银片腐蚀试验是评价喷气燃料腐蚀性的重要指标。

sentences.english: It can be used without modifying automobile engines, and is less corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 利用丁醇不需改造汽车引擎，并且丁醇腐蚀性较小。

sentences.english: Cabinet placed in corrosive items to avoid direct contact with the surface of cabinet put oneself in another's position.
sentences.chinese: 柜子内放置有腐蚀性物品时避免与柜体表面直接接触。

sentences.english: Anhydrous hydrogen chloride is considered non-corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 无水氯化氢被认为是没有腐蚀性的。

sentences.english: A new method was applied to the test of corrosion resistance of SiC-Si3N4 material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氮化硅结合碳化硅材料耐腐蚀性能的测试方法。

sentences.english: We must dilute the saturated solution to reduce its corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须稀释饱和溶液来降低其腐蚀性。

sentences.english: Aluminized coating has fine corrosion-resistant and heat-resistant abiliities.
sentences.chinese: 镀铝层具有良好的耐高温性和耐腐蚀性。

sentences.english: "Dry" indicates dry air or non-corrosive gas as compatible media.
sentences.chinese: “干”表示干燥空气或非腐蚀性气体的兼容媒体。

sentences.english: Excellent water resistance and good anticorrosive property.
sentences.chinese: 防水性能优异防腐蚀性好。

sentences.english: After testing, the liquid is flammable liquid, and there is a strong corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 经检测，该液体为易燃液体，并有较强的腐蚀性。

sentences.english: The 6061 series of aluminum has good corrosion resistance.
sentences.chinese: 6061系列的铝具有良好的耐腐蚀性。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
